subject: Football
lead_paragraph: By going for a two-point conversion — and the victory — instead of a game-tying extra point with 29 seconds left, Broncos Coach Mike Shanahan challenged other N.F.L. coaches: stop being so conservative.
snippet: By going for a two-point conversion — and the victory — instead of a game-tying extra point with 29 seconds left, Broncos Coach Mike Shanahan challenged other N.F.L. coaches: stop being so conservative.
